thread.section_title: Mavis Discount Tire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mavis Discount Tire | mavistire.com
thread.title: Bob
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Bob

author: Bob
title: Bob
text:
Pulled in to the shop on Troy Road in East Greenbush right after opening. My front tire was losing a considerable amount of air. The team, all of whom were very friendly, took care of my problem without delay and at what I felt was a reasonable price.
I have purchased tires and had repairs performed at the same shop in the past and they continue to concentrate on providing excellent customer service.
